law.catch_line: Lieutenant Governor to be member of board.
law.text: One (1) of the three (3) members of the Falls of the Ohio Interstate Park Commission appointed by the Governor pursuant to Article II of the compact set forth in KRS 148.241 shall be the Lieutenant Governor.
law.history: Created 1980 Ky. Acts ch. 141, sec. 10, effective July 15, 1980.
